1 vs 1 Drafting

  • Each draft lasts 9 rounds - QB, RB, RB, WR, WR, TE, K, DEF, and FLEX
  • You will be presented with 4 options each round.
  • You have 15 seconds to choose a player.
  • Choose fast! If your opponent chose a player first, you cannot pick that player

Offensive Scoring

  • 1 point per 25 PASS YDS
  • 1 point per 10 RUSH YDS
  • 6 points per TD
  • 3 points per FG MADE
  • 1 point per XP MADE
  • -1 points per FG MISSED
  • -1 points per XP MISSED
  • -2 points per INT or FUM

Defensive Scoring

  • 1 point per SACK
  • 2 point per INT or FUM
  • 6 points per TD
  • 2 points per SAFETY
  • -4 for 35 PTS ALLOWED
  • -1 for 28 PTS ALLOWED
  • 1 for < 21 PTS ALLOWED
  • 4 for < 14 PTS ALLOWED
  • 7 for < 7 PTS ALLOWED
  • 10 for 0 PTS ALLOWED

Blitz Rating

  • Every user has a Blitz Rating based on performance.
  • The Blitz Rating is a numerical indicator of your fantasy football skill.
  • The Blitz Rating is based on ELO system originally developed for chess.
  • Become the #1 Fantasy Football player.
